name: esem-webpack-build-tool
description: Set-up 1) run "npm install" 2) If there are multiple variations, be sure to add them to the "entry" object in webpack.config.js 3) When ready, run "npm run build" which will start webpack. Webpack will automatically compile on save. 4) Style sheets are exported as separate files,  however you must include them in your js with "import styles from './styles/v1.scss'" for webpack to find them.
